name: OrbusVR: Reborn
description: OrbusVR: Reborn is a ground-up rework of OrbusVR, the only MMORPG designed exclusively for room-scale virtual reality. It includes a re-imagining of the original game, with gorgeous hand-painted visuals, new enemies, new dungeons and raids, new classes, and much more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4950 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
